#!/bin/sh
DNS_LOCAL_CIDRS="local"
IPV4_ENABLED="true"
IPV6_ENABLED="false"
NOT_ROUTED_TO_GATEWAY_CIDRS="10.0.0.0/8 192.168.0.0/16"
VPN_BLOCK_OTHER_TRAFFIC="false"
VPN_INTERFACE="wg0"
VPN_LOCAL_CIDRS="10.0.0.0/8 192.168.0.0/16"
VPN_TRAFFIC_PORT="51820"
VXLAN_GATEWAY_FIRST_DYNAMIC_IP="20"
VXLAN_ID="44"
VXLAN_IPV6_NETWORK="fd60:ca7f:e5d8:42e9"
VXLAN_IP_NETWORK="172.16.1"
VXLAN_PORT="4789"

/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-labs-helm-app-template.title: redis helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-labs-helm-app-template.name: redis
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-labs-helm-app-template.doc:
Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store that is used as a database, cache, and message broker. It provides a fast and flexible solution for storing and retrieving data, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases, including real-time analytics, session management, and more.

Redis is used by Authentik, Authelia, oauth2-proxy.

0:
for iface in $(find /sys/class/net/*/device/driver/module/drivers -maxdepth 1 -path "*i40e*" | awk -F'/' '{print $5}'); do
  echo "=== Tuning ${iface} (i40e) ==="
  echo 'Current ring buffer settings:'
  echo '==========================='
  ethtool -g "${iface}" || echo 'Error reading ring parameters'
  echo '==========================='
  echo "Configuring ${iface} with rx 4096 tx 4096..."
  ethtool -G "${iface}" rx 4096 tx 4096 || echo 'Error setting ring parameters'
  echo 'New ring buffer settings:'
  echo '==========================='
  ethtool -g "${iface}" || echo 'Error reading ring parameters'
  echo '==========================='
done
sleep infinity
